input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: KANTON AOFRUU, DFR, REAL ESTATE AOBAW. Summary: Abbey Olsberg, Replacement Heat Generation; Bkp 240 (244/250) Heating (ventilation/sanitary) Canton of Aargau, Department of Finance and Resources, Immobilien Aargau. Description: The area of the Olsberg Abbey is operated via a central oil heater, which supplies the buildings with heat. The existing oil heating has reached its lifespan and is to be replaced by wood chip heating. A new building with underground schnitzel bunkers for the new wooden schnitzel heating is being built. In this there is the wooden schnitzel heating with electrical filters and the silo with drawers, as well as the ventilation and individual sanitary connections. The new heating distributor is coupled in the best heating center main building via the new district heating line. The customary heat water treatment is converted and adapted to the new circumstances. The heat distribution to the individual other buildings continues to be distributed via the existing heat distribution. The order content includes the dismantling and assembly of heat generation BKP 240 as well as work on the ventilation BKP 244 and sanitary work BKP 250.. Published Date: 2023-11-23. Closing Date: 2023-12-18. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: KANTON AOFRUU, DFR, REAL ESTATE AOBAW
output.Summary: Abbey Olsberg, Replacement Heat Generation; Bkp 240 (244/250) Heating (ventilation/sanitary) Canton of Aargau, Department of Finance and Resources, Immobilien Aargau
output.Description: The area of the Olsberg Abbey is operated via a central oil heater, which supplies the buildings with heat. The existing oil heating has reached its lifespan and is to be replaced by wood chip heating. A new building with underground schnitzel bunkers for the new wooden schnitzel heating is being built. In this there is the wooden schnitzel heating with electrical filters and the silo with drawers, as well as the ventilation and individual sanitary connections. The new heating distributor is coupled in the best heating center main building via the new district heating line. The customary heat water treatment is converted and adapted to the new circumstances. The heat distribution to the individual other buildings continues to be distributed via the existing heat distribution. The order content includes the dismantling and assembly of heat generation BKP 240 as well as work on the ventilation BKP 244 and sanitary work BKP 250.

Description: The procurement subject of this tender are measurement services for field recordings and track plugs on the line network of the Zurich Verkehrsbetriebe (VBZ). With this order, the awarding agency awards two framework contracts. The two surcharges will thus become standard suppliers of the VBZ for surveying services in the coming years. The total volume is divided into the two framework contract partners during the duration of the contract as well as possible. If one of the two surcharges are unable to provide the required resources in a project, the award office will fall back on the other surcharge.. Published Date: 2023-11-23. Closing Date: 2024-01-09. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: INHABITANT MUNICIPALITY OF LOHN-AMMANNSEGG. Summary: Return the Chaleur Loahn-ammansgg Enlownederently Love-ammanl. Description: The municipality of Lohn-Ammannsegg provides a heat network with remote heating. The two bourgeois municipalities of Lohn and Ammannsegg as well as the municipal council of Lohn-Ammannsegg have decided to use wood in the region to produce heat. The objective of the town of Lohn-Ammannsegg is to create the basis of a heat network with the initial capacity of its own buildings. This must be able to be extended so that in the future, an important part of the buildings of Lohn-Ammannsegg can be supplied in heat resulting from sustainable production. The municipality of Lohn-Ammannsegg therefore seeks a supplier which carries out the heat network project as an investor and heat supplier and which operates it for the next 30 years.. Published Date: 2023-08-04. Closing Date: 2023-10-03. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Return the Chaleur Loahn-ammansgg Enlownederently Love-ammanl
output.Description: The municipality of Lohn-Ammannsegg provides a heat network with remote heating. The two bourgeois municipalities of Lohn and Ammannsegg as well as the municipal council of Lohn-Ammannsegg have decided to use wood in the region to produce heat. The objective of the town of Lohn-Ammannsegg is to create the basis of a heat network with the initial capacity of its own buildings. This must be able to be extended so that in the future, an important part of the buildings of Lohn-Ammannsegg can be supplied in heat resulting from sustainable production. The municipality of Lohn-Ammannsegg therefore seeks a supplier which carries out the heat network project as an investor and heat supplier and which operates it for the next 30 years.

The aim of the municipality of Lohn-Ammannsegg is to create the basis for a heating network with the starting capacity of your own properties. This should be expanded so that a significant proportion of the properties of wage mannersgg can be supplied with heat from sustainable production in the future. As a result, the municipality of Lohn-Ammannsegg is looking for a provider to implement the planned heating network as an investor and heat supplier and operate for the next 30 years.. The aim of the municipality of Lohn-Ammannsegg is to create the basis for a heating network with the starting capacity of your own properties. This should be expanded so that a significant proportion of the properties of wage mannersgg can be supplied with heat from sustainable production in the future. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SWG GRENCHEN POSTFACH 944. Summary: Hot Heat and Electricity Contract Swg Grenchen. Description: The objective is to use the heat present in tunnel water by means of heat pumps for the heating of new and existing buildings in the Hitirain district, as well as for the production of hot water. The Opportant Agency AG will be the user, SWG will be the heat supplier and will take care of the planning, construction and operation of the installation. SWG has concluded a heat supply contract with the owner of Oelirain AG, in which all the important points of the future commercial relationship are settled. This call for tenders aims to find suppliers capable of implementing the following services on behalf of SWG as a heat supplier within the framework of the project. The services are put in the competition and allocated by lots. The call for tenders is divided into two lots: lot 1: CFC 242: 5 heating installations (one per building), including the connection of building D to network Energy.lot 2: CFC 2315: 5 PV installations until and including the inverter (one per building). Published Date: 2023-03-04. Closing Date: 2023-04-13. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: CITY OF ZURICH DISPOSAL RECYCLING ZURICH. Summary: Delivery of Heat Meters for District Heating Networks, 3 Lots. Description: The district heating (FW) from Entsorgung Recycling Zuerich (ERZ) operates the large district heating networks in the city of Zurich. The heat is delivered to the customer by means of hot water in a pipe system. Heat is currently being transferred to various customers or Lieg at more than 2,300 heat transfer stations (WUEST).properties.<br> For the invoicing of the heat supplied, ERZ FW needs an estimated total of 2070 heat meters (WZ) in different dimensions and pressure levels (divided into batches according to the pressure level) from May 1st, 2023 to December 31st, 2026 (duration).<br> The heat meters are one combination ofon Flow measurement (volume measurement, medium: hot water) and calculator. ERZ installs the heat meter itself at the customer. The temperature sensors are only part of this tender for lot 1, for lots 2 and 3 the temperature sensors will be provided and installed by ERZ FW.<br> Doc Title: Meters<br> Contract Type: Supplies. Published Date: 2023-01-06. Closing Date: 2023-02-21. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: Document Type: Contract Notice <br> Title: Procurement Fuel and Fuel <br> Reference Number: 2021 / S 201-526369 <br> Contract Type: Supplies <br> Description: The SBB writes for 5 years of burning and fuels with the following 3 lots: <br> Lot 1, approx. 10 million liters of Diesel B0 per year. The diesel is supplied by truck to around 70 rail tank stations. Optional on advance notice 6 months to advance, step-by-step HVO Blend per gas station, if available, economical.
